body.name: Microwave Popcorn Popper with Borosilicate Glass Temperature Safe Glass, 3-in-1 Lid Measures Kernels and Melts Butter & BPA Free, Dishwasher Safe,1.5-Quart, Red
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 26 mins
features: HEALTHY POPCORN POPPING: Enjoy guilt-free snacking with the GIEZL Microwave Popcorn Popper Glass, designed for hot air popping without the need for oil, making it a healthier choice for your popcorn cravings.
BPA-FREE AND FOOD-SAFE: Your health is our priority. Rest easy knowing that our popcorn popper is made from BPA-free materials, ensuring that your popcorn is free from harmful chemicals.

CONVENIENT MICROWAVE USE: Quickly and easily pop your favorite popcorn in the microwave with this efficient popcorn popper. Its 1.50-quart capacity is perfect for serving up a delicious and satisfying snack in minutes.

DURABLE BOROSILICATE GLASS: Crafted from premium borosilicate glass, our popcorn popper ensures durability and high heat resistance. Experience a reliable and long-lasting popcorn-popping solution for your home.

COMPACT AND SPACE-SAVING: The GIEZL Microwave Popcorn Popper Glass is designed to be compact and space-saving, making it an ideal addition to any kitchen. Enjoy popcorn whenever the craving strikes without taking up valuable storage space.

EASY CLEANUP WITH DISHWASHER-SAFE DESIGN: Save time on cleanup with our dishwasher-safe popcorn popper. After enjoying your popcorn, simply place the glass bowl in the dishwasher for effortless and convenient maintenance.
body.description: Indulge in guilt-free popcorn snacking with the GIEZL Microwave Popcorn Popper Glass. This hot air popcorn popper makes it easy to enjoy your favorite treat without the need for oil, offering a healthier alternative for home use. Crafted from durable borosilicate glass, the 1.50-quart popper is not only heat-resistant but also dishwasher-safe for effortless cleanup. The protective silicon exterior and lid ensure a secure grip and added safety during use. BPA-free and compact in design, this popcorn popper is the perfect addition to your kitchen, providing a convenient and enjoyable way to elevate your snacking experience. Order yours today for a popcorn-popping revolution at home!
